product_name: Merrell Ophelia Long-Sleeve Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Made from an easy-care, stretch fabric that moves with you, the women's Merrell Ophelia long-sleeve shirt is built to handle travel adventures with ease. Stretchy polyester, treated with Merrell Opti-Wick(TM), moves moisture away from your skin and accelerates the evaporation process. Integrated UPF 30 sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. Articulated underarm piecing and stretch side panels enhance breathability and comfort. Merrell Ophelia shirt features 2 chest pockets and 1 zippered security pocket to safely stow essentials. Closeout.
short_description: Made from an easy-care, stretch fabric that moves with you, the women's Merrell Ophelia long-sleeve shirt is built to handle travel adventures with ease.
